compliant.section: Wiwynn accepts no responsibility for to the accuracy of the content for any purpose and makes no commitment to update the content.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and information to be provided in case of automated decision-making

compliant.section: Any responses from website visitors shall be deemed non-confidential and Wiwynn shall be free to copy, use and distribute any information or ideas contained in such responses.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data, Lawfulness of processing

non_compliant.section: You agree that Wiwynn may in its sole discretion and without prior notice, terminate your access to the Website and/or block your future access to the Website if we determine that you have violated these Terms of Use.
non_compliant.amend: Wiwynn should provide users with the right to receive their personal data in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format, and to transmit those data to another controller without hindrance from Wiwynn, where technically feasible.

non_compliant.section: You also agree that any violation by you of these Terms of Use will constitute an unlawful and unfair business practice, and will cause irreparable harm to Wiwynn, for which monetary damages would be inadequate, and you consent to Wiwynn obtaining any injunctive or equitable relief that Wiwynn deems necessary or appropriate in such circumstances.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to an effective judicial remedy against a supervisory authority
non_compliant.amend: Users have the right to an effective judicial remedy against legally binding decisions of a supervisory authority, as well as against a controller or processor.

non_compliant.section: Except where prohibited by law, in no event shall Wiwynn be liable for any direct, special, indirect, or consequential damages or any damages whatsoever, including loss of profits or data, whether in an action in contract or tort, in connection with the use or performance of this information, even if Wiwynn has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
non_compliant.amend: Wiwynn should be liable for material or non-material damage resulting from infringement of the GDPR.

non_compliant.section: These Terms of Use and any separate agreements whereby we provide you Services shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Taiwan R.
non_compliant.amend: While the GDPR does not explicitly prohibit choosing the law of a non-EU country, it emphasizes that the GDPR applies to the processing of personal data of data subjects in the EU, regardless of whether the processing takes place in the EU.  Consider clarifying the application of the GDPR alongside Taiwanese law.
